title: Best Man #1
name: Paolo Calizo
bio: Big brother, PLUR specialist, & everyone's favorite presidential candidate. Helps patients in the wait room & lifts heavy in the weight room.

title: Best Man #2
name: Marc Gabas
bio: Best friend. Chicken, ranch, and Krispy Kreme enthusiast; will possibly fall asleep in your parking garage after a night out & super smash. Will dance without warning.

title: Groomsman
name: CJ Mauricio
bio: The high school best friend. Proud cop & newest member of the hot dads community. Lover of fishing, grilling, & long strolls in the Wellington mall parking lot.

title: Groomsman
name: Evan Agillon
bio: The college hype-man you never knew you needed. Boxer & facial hair advocate; will only settle for the highest ABV % beer in the room...did somebody say beer pong?

title: Groomsman
name: Sam Hampshire
bio: Cousin? Uncle? Who knows. The childhood best friend & your next photographer. You can find him cooking lobbies at Rogue's Den or in his car going zoom.

title: Groomsman
name: Martin Sarmiento
bio: World-renowned trail slayer and your rave buddy for life; will ask you (and himself) unecessary philosophical questions.

title: Groomsman
name: Jake Yap
bio: Best friend to Cherrie since forever (their dads have a bromance). The worst person to reply to a text, but never to a meme.
